Articles.Content:
First just let me say I am not sure this goes here but seeing as I just started playing I took my best guess...

Back to my Celebration....!!!!

OMG, I finally did it!! I picked up this game this weekend after watching several youtubers playing in on their channel. I have spent the last 2 days slaving and toiling (read trying, sucking, and failing) to put not only my first successful geosync orbit together but to man it with 3 Kerbins and a satellite to leave in that orbit and get them all home without incident.

This game is crazy fun and supper frustrating but I just love it!
Welcome newcomer! I hope you enjoy this as much as I do! Have fun on the forums!
Haha, wait until you start wanting to build a Space Station, that's a pain in the butt trying to rendezvous with rest of the Station!

Welcome to the community Quaiden

Congrats on your orbit and first station, that's no small feat, unlike games with "achievements" KSP really goves you a feeling of accomplishment when you figure out how to do things

Have fun learning, and fly safe!
